name: Collard Greens
properties: Part of Daily Dozen greens and cruciferous vegetables
High in vitamins A, C, and K
Can be used interchangeably with kale
benefits: Collard greens are cruciferous green vegetables that provide both greens and cruciferous vegetable benefits. They offer powerful antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds. The hearty texture makes them excellent for soups and stews.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - counts toward both greens (2 servings) and cruciferous (1 serving) daily, typically 6 cups chopped fresh

quotes: GREENS checkbox in Daily Dozen. CRUCIFEROUS VEGETABLES checkbox in Daily Dozen
6 cups/220g chopped fresh kale, collards or other dark greens - Stir in the kale, kidney beans and Super-Charged Spice Blend
